featured.text: Later, in the medieval Islamic Caliphate, a form of passport was the bara’a, a receipt for taxes paid.
Only people who paid their taxes were permitted to travel to different regions of the Caliphate.

definition.zh_def: 哈里發制度：伊斯蘭教的政治和宗教領導體系，由哈里發統治，代表穆罕默德的繼承者。
definition.en_def: A caliphate is a form of Islamic government led by a caliph, who is considered a political and religious successor to the Prophet Muhammad.
definition.example: The caliphate was an important political entity in the early history of Islam.
